Born: Pablo Diego Jos Francisco de Paula Juan Nepomuceno Mara de los Remedios Cipriano de la Santsima Trinidad Ruiz y Picasso  ( 1881-10-25 ) 25 October 1881 Mlaga ,  Spain
Education: Jos Ruiz y Blasco  (father)    Real Academia de Bellas Artes de San Fernando
KnownFor: Painting, drawing,  sculpture ,  printmaking ,  ceramics ,  stage design , writing
NotableWork: La Vie  (1903) Family of Saltimbanques  (1905) Les Demoiselles d'Avignon  (1907) Portrait of Daniel-Henry Kahnweiler  (1910) Girl before a Mirror  (1932) Le Rve  (1932) Guernica  (1937) The Weeping Woman  (1937)
Spouse(S): Olga Khokhlova ( m. 1918;  d. 1955) Jacqueline Roque  ( m. 1961)
